‚ùóÔ∏èPlease note that if you make a mistake with proper nouns, the image may not be output as intended. Some models may not have learned the content of the prompt, and may not be output as intended. Please understand this in advance
(Enter the proper noun in English or Roman letters)
What kind of poster image do you want?
(English or Roman letters only, separated by commas)
AI outputs a different image every time
Lighting like a movie, dramatic taste close to input photos
A sexy punk world view. Independently generates posing based on prompt, clothing and background
Hero -like taste. Vivid color. Independently generates posing based on prompt, clothing and background
Dark villain taste close to input photos
A view of the world where flowers are scattered. Independently generates posing based on prompt, clothing and background
Cyberpunk -like SF -like view based on input photos
Generate colorful street graffiti independently based on prompt. There is a gap from the input photo
Convert input photos to Picasso\'s new style
Convert the input photo into a moe anime -like style. Automatic generation of elements
Convert the input photo into a stylish pixel art.
Independently generates a medieval fantasy world view like an RPG game based on prompt. Sometimes different from input photos
Produced a Japanese samurai style based on input photos.

AI may output inaccurate and flawed images. Please accept this RISK before proceeding. Please note that some images are output with text2image that does not follow the input image. Keep in mind that there are hits and misses.

Description of easy-to-output images
„ÉªClear and high-quality images
„ÉªSimple background
„ÉªClear contrast
„ÉªAppropriate image size
If the generation fails, you can retry for free until it succeeds.
There may be copyright issues if you use generated images depicting someone other than yourself for commercial purposes. Images generated by this app are primarily for personal use.
If generation failed and you want to cancel your purchase, you can do so from the ‚ÄúPayments and Subscriptions‚Äù page of the store.
Cannot access the internet. Please check your connection.
Please wait about 40 minutes for generating‚Ä¶

We will notify you when it is completed. Don\'t close the app completely as it will stop generating. (Won\'t stop if in background) Especially older devices may kill or restart the app when put in the background. If generation fails due to an error, you can generate it for free by exiting the app (generating time exceeds 1 hour, etc.) and uploading the photo again.
Please wait until the end of generation
